generic.contactSupport: If this persists, please contact support.

permission.noPermission: You don't have permission to do this.
permission.botNoPermission: I don't have permission to do this.
permission.ownerOnly: This action can only be performed by the server owner.

validation.tooLong: Must be no more than {{max}} characters.
validation.invalidEmail: Must be a valid email address.
validation.invalidChoice: Invalid choice. Please select from the available options.

rateLimit.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please slow down.

auth.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to do this.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
auth.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this resource.

server.featureDisabled: This feature is disabled on this server.

premium.required: This feature requires a premium subscription.
premium.tierRequired: This feature requires {{tier}} tier or higher.
premium.limitReached: You have reached the limit for your subscription tier.

bot.botCannotTarget: I cannot perform this action on myself.
bot.cannotTargetOwner: I cannot perform this action on the server owner.
bot.cannotTargetHigherRole: I cannot perform this action on users with a higher role than me.
bot.cannotTargetSelf: You cannot perform this action on yourself.
